title: Injecting Disinfectant & UV Light Inside the Body
summary: During COVID press conference, Trump suggested researching injection of disinfectant and bringing UV light 'inside the body.' Lysol, Clorox issued emergency warnings. Disinfectant poisoning calls spiked dramatically.
keyFacts: April 23, 2020 press conference: Suggested researching injection of disinfectant as COVID treatment
Exact quote: 'And then I see the disinfectant, where it knocks it out in a minute, one minute. And is there a way we can do something like that by injection inside or almost a cleaning?'
Also suggested bringing UV light 'inside the body' somehow
Lysol, Clorox, and poison control centers issued emergency warnings not to ingest disinfectants
Next day claimed he was 'being sarcastic' - video clearly shows he was addressing medical experts seriously
Disinfectant poisoning calls spiked dramatically after the briefing according to CDC poison control data
CNN: 'Trump lied Friday when he said he was being sarcastic'

sources.text: White House briefing video transcript, April 23, 2020
Emergency statements from Lysol, Clorox, April 2020
